name: GMTK Jam 2019 Prototype - One screen platformer
name_original: GMTK Jam 2019 Prototype - One screen platformer
description:
How to play :

Movement Keys - Player movement

X - Dash

C - Jump

Recommended to download and play windows executable.

Think the prototype conveys the design i was going for. The idea was to make the whole game in 1 screen.
